titleStmt.title: To all the faithfull and suffering members in all holes, prisons, and goals for the Word of God and testimony of Jesus Christ, with the rest of the faithful where-ever scatter'd upon the face of the earth
titleStmt.author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle,

notesStmt.note: Written by William Dewsbury. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
